alert.note: Alert for Kodiak Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 27 at 2:57AM AKST until November 28 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 PM AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Kodiak Island. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 3 PM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will spread west to east across Kodiak Island Sunday afternoon, continuing through Monday morning before tapering off. There is still some uncertainty in the exact track of the storm system, resulting in lower confidence in total snow amounts along the eastern coast of the island at this time. However, there is the potential for up to 6 inches of snow for Kodiak City.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
